key_phrases: Less applications, and more proactive funding
Philanthropists don't wait to have artists seek them out
they know who and what they value and then they become patrons
ACME should seek to provide funding to orgs that they see doing great things
y'all are out in the community and can evaluate the work firsthand
solutions_proposed: reduce the number of applications required
adopt a more proactive funding approach
fund organizations based on firsthand community evaluation
